column3:
You want to add the subsidy 1000 times :)

Perhaps also check that the total is not only below 21M, but also close to it.
Ok fixed thousandfold error and added check for total.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/fecba4e2699359e25cccd40266de9697f30ea95e for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
